title: Don't Let Go
lyrics:
Do wires hum when lights stay low? Static whispers what we used to know Can circuits keep what memories show? Do codes hold patterns long ago?
Numbers dance in midnight air Old machines breathe soft and slow Data streams like morning glow Time preserves what we outgrow
Time spins round like old records play Light persists though threads fray Hold tight to what light remains Morning comes to heal old pains
Do wires hum when lights go low? Moon whispers things we used to know
title: Night Whispers
